LanguageData.Dissection_MessageDestroyedByDoctor: {1} has accidentally destroyed {0}'s corpse during the dissection.
LanguageData.Dissection_ExpSetting_desc: The amount of exp a default corpse yields (before calculating the individual corpse exp).
LanguageData.Dissection_DailyLimitSetting_desc: If activated, dissection will not count towards the daily learning limit (4000) and the experience will not be reduced to 20% after this limit is reached.
LanguageData.Dissection_DestroyBodyChanceSetting_desc: The base chance that a body is destroyed during the dissection (between 0.0 and 1.0). The actual chance is a lot lower depending on the dissector's medicine skill level. Set to 0 to never destroy a body.
LanguageData.Dissection_AlwaysDestroyBodiesSetting_de: Always destroys the body when dissecting, if this option is enabled.
